class.name: com.yunhai.excel.orm.TechRefProSinEngDecompose
class.comment: 技改大修项目单项工程拆分汇总表

column.name: VERSION
column.comment: 数据版本

column.name: CAL_YEAR
column.comment: 日历年

column.name: INDEXOF
column.comment: 序号

column.name: PROJECT_MANAGE_ORG_NAME
column.comment: 项目管理单位

column.name: PROJECT_IMPLEMENT_ORG_NAME
column.comment: 项目实施单位

column.name: ASSET_RPOPERTY
column.comment: 资产属性

column.name: SUBSTATION_LINE_VOLTAGE_LEVEL
column.comment: 电压等级(kV)

column.name: PROJECT_ID
column.comment: 项目编码

column.name: PROJECT_NAME
column.comment: 工程名称

column.name: SINGLE_PROJECT_TYPE
column.comment: 单项工程类型

column.name: REFORM_EQUIP_VOLTAGE_LEVEL
column.comment: 改造设备的电压等级(kV)

column.name: SINGLE_PROJECT_CONTENT
column.comment: 单项工程内容

column.name: TECHNICAL_REFORM_START_TIME
column.comment: 技改项目开工时间

column.name: TECHNICAL_REFORM_END_TIME
column.comment: 技改项目竣工时间

column.name: PRE_REGULATION_VERSION
column.comment: 采用预规版本

column.name: TRANSFORMER_EQUIPMENT_MODEL
column.comment: 技术参数>>主变压器>>设备型式

column.name: TRANSFORMER_REFORM_QUANTITY
column.comment: 技术参数>>主变压器>>改造台数

column.name: TRANSFORMER_SINGLE_CAPACITY
column.comment: 技术参数>>主变压器>>"单台容量(MVA)"

column.name: TRANSFORMER_AFT_TAX_UNIT_PRICE
column.comment: 技术参数>>主变压器>>"单台价格(含税)(万元/台)"

column.name: CIRCUIT_BREAKER_MODEL
column.comment: 技术参数>>断路器>>设备型式

column.name: RATED_CURRENT
column.comment: 技术参数>>断路器>>"额定短路开断电流(kA)"

column.name: CIRCUIT_BREAK_REFORM_QUANTITY
column.comment: 技术参数>>断路器>>改造台数

column.name: CIRCU_BREAK_AFT_TAX_UNIT_PRICE
column.comment: 技术参数>>断路器>>"单价(含税)(万元/台)"

column.name: ISOLATING_SWIT_STUCTURE_MODEL
column.comment: 技术参数>>隔离开关>>结构型式

column.name: ISOLATING_SWIT_REFORM_QUANTITY
column.comment: 技术参数>>隔离开关>>改造台数

column.name: ISOLAT_SWIT_AFT_TAX_UNIT_PRICE
column.comment: 技术参数>>隔离开关>>"单价(含税)(万元/台)"

column.name: CONSTRUCTION_COST
column.comment: 竣工决算(万元)>>建筑工程费

column.name: EQUIPMENT_PURCHASE_COST
column.comment: 设备购置费

column.name: TOTAL_INSTALL_ENGINEERING_COST
column.comment: 安装工程费>>安装工程费合计

column.name: AFT_TAX_INSTALL_DEV_MATER_COST
column.comment: 安装工程费>>其中,装置性材料费用(含税)

column.name: DEMOLITION_COST
column.comment: 拆除工程费

column.name: TOTAL_OTHER_COST
column.comment: 其他费用>>其他费用总计

column.name: STATIC_INVESTMENT
column.comment: 静态投资

column.name: BEF_TECHNI_REFORM_EQUIP_ERP_ID
column.comment: 技改前>>设备ERP编码

column.name: BEF_TECHNI_REFORM_EQUIP_PMS_ID
column.comment: 技改前>>设备PMS编码

column.name: BEF_TECH_REFO_EQUIP_WORK_STAT
column.comment: 技改前>>技改前设备运行状态(勾选)

column.name: EQUIP_TECHNICAL_REFORM_REASON
column.comment: 技改前>>设备技改原因描述(勾选)

column.name: TECH_REFO_FEASIB_ORIG_DESI_DOC
column.comment: 技改前>>提供技改项目可研/初设文件

column.name: RESIDUE_RATIO
column.comment: 设备处置信息>>成新率（资产净值/原值）

column.name: EQUIPMENT_DEAL_STATION
column.comment: 设备处置信息>>设备处置情况(勾选)

column.name: ASSET_ACTUAL_USED_AGE
column.comment: 设备处置信息>>资产实际使用年龄

column.name: DISCARD_ASSET_AGE
column.comment: 设备处置信息>>若报废处理，填写报废资产年龄

column.name: AFTER_TECHNICAL_REFORM_ERP_ID
column.comment: 技改(转资)后>>设备ERP编码

column.name: AFTER_TECHNICAL_REFORM_PMS_ID
column.comment: 技改(转资)后>>设备PMS编码

column.name: AFT_TECH_REF_SER_ABN_STA_TIMES
column.comment: 技改(转资)后>>技改后设备运行状态评价>>出现严重/异常状态次数

column.name: AFT_TECH_REF_DEFECT_TIMES
column.comment: 原有的，技改(转资)后>>出现缺陷次数

column.name: AFT_TECH_REF_ACHIE_SOL_PRO_BEN
column.comment: 技改(转资)后>>技改后取得效果/解决的问题/效益

column.name: POST_EVALUATION_REPORT
column.comment: 技改(转资)后>>提供后评价报告

column.name: HISTORICAL_DEFECT_TIMES
column.comment: 技改前>>历史缺陷数量

column.name: DISCARC_AGE
column.comment: 技改前>>报废年龄

column.name: AFT_TECH_REFORM_DEFECT_TIMES
column.comment: 新的，技改(转资)后>>出现缺陷次数

column.name: WORKING_AGE
column.comment: 技改后>>运行年份
